name: EnderAPI
tagline: A free to use, modifiable API by the people, for the people
body:
## Developement Team SuicidalSTDz - Lead Developer
apemanzilla - Developer
skwerlman - Developer
EngineerCoding - Developer
## Documentation ### Colors API Deprecated ### Fs API ``` fs.append( sPath, sData ) ``` ( Insert description here )
``` fs.read( sPath ) ``` ( Insert description here )
``` fs.save( sPath, sData ) ``` ( Insert description here )
### HTTP API ``` http.download( sURL, sFile ) ``` * Downloads the given sURL as sFile
* Returns: nil
### MessageBox API WARNING: Probably very buggy
``` messageBox.create( sText, fYes, fNo ) ``` ( Insert description here )
### Number API ``` number.generate( nLength, nMin, nMax ) ``` ( Insert description here )
``` number.isEven( n ) ``` ( Insert description here )
``` number.isOdd( n ) ``` ( Insert description here )
### Pastebin API ``` pastebin.get( sCode, sFile ) ``` ( Insert description here )
``` pastebin.put( sFile ) ``` ( Insert description here )
``` pastebin.updateFile( sCode, sFile ) ``` ( Insert description here )
### String API ``` string.generate( nLength, nCharSet ) ``` ( Insert description here )
``` string:replaceChar( nPos, sReplace ) ``` ( Insert description here )
``` string:safePattern() ``` ( Insert description here )
``` string:splitAtWhite() ``` ( Insert description here )

### Text API ``` text.bracket( sText, nx, ny, nTextColour, nBracketColour, nBackgroundColour ) ``` ( Insert description here )
